James Mensching is a leading US based Executive Recruiter specializing in CXO, SVP, VP and Director level placements. Having placed Senior Executives in a variety of industries while possessing a strong business background not only in the US but also in the Asia-Pacific (co-founding his own engineering & manufacturing firm in Beijing, China), James is able to deliver timely and effective solutions to businesses both large and small. As James grows his reputation as a recruiter who has the capability to build the hearts of businesses everywhere and in multiple industries, clients are continuing to consider James as their premier and exclusive Executive Search Agent.

“When servicing clients, I streamline the process by doing a thorough examination of hiring authorities and the companiesâ€™ needs, mapping out a practical timeline for completion and then hand-picking the elite players. I want to be sure that I not only find the best-qualified candidates for a position but also the candidate that is the â€œbest-fitâ€ for an organization’s culture and synergy. I am dedicated to always exceed a clientâ€™s expectations by ‘going the extra mile’ every step of the way but never sacrificing integrity for success. I am committed to excellence in service, integrity and effective solutions for businesses.

“As a service to my clients, I maintain 50+ top executives & industry professionals from a variety of industries and backgrounds in order to reduce the duration of vacancies.”

Member of the Memphis World Trade Club
